title: How to Make a Mojo Drink

steps.headline: Pour the rum into a large pitcher or punch bowl.
Pour the vodka into the pitcher or bowl.
Pour the amaretto into the pitcher or bowl.
Pour the gin into the pitcher or bowl.
Pour both cans of your favorite beer into the pitcher or bowl.
Pour a single can of Sprite into the pitcher or bowl.
Pour the orange juice into the pitcher or bowl.
Pour the pineapple juice into the pitcher or bowl.
Fill the pitcher or bowl with ice.

text: Pour the rum into a large pitcher or punch bowl.  Pour the vodka into the pitcher or bowl.  Pour the amaretto into the pitcher or bowl.  Pour the gin into the pitcher or bowl.  Pour both cans of your favorite beer into the pitcher or bowl.  Pour a single can of Sprite into the pitcher or bowl.  Pour the orange juice into the pitcher or bowl.  Pour the pineapple juice into the pitcher or bowl.  Fill the pitcher or bowl with ice.  Stir well.  Serve in punch cups.
